tool_description: Combines weather data from multiple sources, stations, or parameters into unified datasets while handling data conflicts and source prioritization.

source_names.description: Names of data sources being aggregated

timestamps_list.description: Arrays of timestamps from each source

values_list.description: Arrays of values from each source

aggregation_method.description: Method for combining overlapping data: average, priority, or maximum

source_priorities.description: Priority weights for each source when using priority method

time_tolerance_minutes.description: Time tolerance for matching observations (1-120 minutes)

error_messages: Inconsistent array lengths: source_names, timestamps_list, and values_list must have the same length.
Insufficient sources: At least 2 data sources required for aggregation.
Priority mismatch: When using priority method, source_priorities must match number of sources.
Invalid time tolerance: Must be between 1 and 120 minutes.
Empty data source: One or more sources contain no valid data.
usage: Provide multiple data sources with their timestamps and values. Configure aggregation method and time tolerance to combine data intelligently while resolving conflicts.

source_contributions.description: Source names that contributed to each unified data point

conflict_count.description: Number of conflicts resolved during aggregation

total_records.description: Total number of records in unified dataset
